property_address: Entire cabin in Pine, Arizona, United States
listing_description: Modern, beautifully architected and spacious 2 bed/2 bath single-level cabin in a gated, upscale community.  Sits on side of mountain with incredible views all around.  Home is in a secluded cul-de-sac, with paved rolling hills for walking/biking or sight seeing.  Hike to the top of Ruin Hill where you can see Native American Ruins or sit in the back patio and enjoy the Elk visitors.Only 1hr 45min from Phoenix area, Level 2 (50A) EV Charger onsite. Typically 20 deg cooler than Phoenix area.The spaceHome has two bedrooms, one with king bed and a bunk bed (with it's own full bath).  The 2nd bedroom has a king bed and a shared full bathroom.  House is equipped with high-end kitchen appliances, electric fireplace, and new quartz counter-tops. Breakfast bar leads to a kitchen fully-stocked with all pots, pans & silverware, along with Keurig machine, coffee maker, toasters (4-slice and oven).The living room includes a huge plush couch and recliner facing a 75" flat smart screen TV with cable. All bedrooms and the garage game room have new smart TVs.The detached insulated garage is set up as a game room with a pool table, kids games,  smart TV and oversized sofa chairs.  It has it's own AC system and also has a small refrigerator and microwave.  Sleds can be found in garage for winter fun.  Enjoy the incredible views from the front deck. It has table/chairs for outside eating and can also find a hammock.  Rear deck has picnic table and propane grill.

property_address: Room in Phoenix, Arizona, United States

Guest will have access to a full bathroom Shared amongst guests. Location is convenient, only minutes away from downtown and adjacent to Encanto Park and Golf Course; about 6 miles away from the Sky Harbor Airport.The spaceClose to I-10 freeway which connects you to Tempe and Scottsdale in about 15-20 minutes,  and I-17 will connect you to West Gate and State Farm Stadium 15-20 min away as well. You will also have a parking spot if necessary, located on the west side of the house.During your stayOur names are Alejandro and Pepe and we are a gay couple, pretty laid back, open minded, if you need any assistance we will do our best, you just need to communicate your thoughts personally or through text message; on weekdays we are taking care of our jobs as educators, therefore if you shoot us a message and we don't respond immediately, it means we are working at the time being but will message you back  as soon as we are out of work ( around 3:00 pm) but no worries, we will get in contact with you as soon as possible and looking forward to host you, Welcome to the Valley Of The Sun.Other things to noteThe neighborhood is pretty quiet, the only noise you will hear is from the train that passes by randomly. (Earplugs provides and can be found on the night stand)Also we have recently added a ring door bell Camera (front of the house ) they Ring system has helped to provide some live assistance to first timer guest since most of the days we are out of the house on our regular jobs.

property_address: Entire guest suite in Mesa, Arizona, United States
listing_description: Our Private Upscale Large Guest House provides a discreet setting, that offers both privacy and comfort. This spacious guest house is over 850 square feet and comfortably sleeps 2 adults.  With its own private entrance, you are free to come and go as you please.We are conveniently located by all of the local hot spots. We have 630+ 5 star reviews, with a commitment to providing a great experience.The spaceThis single story private guest house is completely separate from the main house.The space has a bathtub, shower, queen bed, two couches, reading chair, work area, dining table, microwave/air fryer/toaster oven, blender, Keurig, mini fridge, blow dryer, and iron.  The House also provides custom wood shutters for more privacy. The Backyard is a shared space with the homeowner and their Newfypoo and a few chickens. Our guests love watching the chickens. The dog is super friendly and the chickens tend to keep to themselves. Pierre the rooster does like to wake up with a nice cock-a-doodle-doo and the ladies sometimes squawk when they are laying their eggs. They put themselves to bed at sunset, and unless they are startled, they are quiet at night. The kitchenette DOES NOT have a full size oven, stove top, garbage disposal, or dishwasher. Kitchenettes are a smaller version of a full size kitchen, designed for quick easy meals that are prepared in a convection oven / microwave.Guest accessThere is a separate, private front and side door entrance that provides convenience to come and go as you please.Other things to noteThe shower/bath area is open to the “bedroom”. The toilet and sink do have a closed space with a door for privacy.
